feed.title: Manyfold Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Manyfold: v0.84.0
entry.content:
If you're on a public or shared instance, this might be helpful; now you can mark models as "sensitive" (i.e. NSFW, or otherwise something to be careful about). You can also choose how you want to display sensitive items; you can show them normally, blur them in the lists, or you can hide them completely!

There are also a couple of high-priority bugfixes for database migrations that were causing problems in v0.83.0.

What's Changed

âœ¨ New Features âœ¨

  • Add "sensitive" setting for models, and user control of how they're displayed by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2969

ğŸ› Bug Fixes ğŸ›

  • Fix migration issue ("destination exists" Problems) by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2975
  • Fix default role name migration by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2976

Full Changelog: https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/compare/v0.83.0...v0.84.0

entry.title: New release for Manyfold: v0.85.0
entry.content:
A small release, but hopefully good for usability! Following creators is now easier and more obvious with a new creator profile page, and Manyfold will also match existing accounts with OIDC logins.

What's Changed

âœ¨ New Features âœ¨

  • New creator profile page by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3002

ğŸ› Bug Fixes ğŸ›

  • Update naming of sort button translations by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3004
  • Rearrange layout of creator profile by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3008
  • Don't use User username in activitypub IDs by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3009

ğŸŒ Sustainability & Performance ğŸŒ

  • Try jemalloc and YJIT for performance improvements by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2987

ğŸ› ï¸ Other Improvements ğŸ› ï¸

  • Merge existing accounts with OIDC logins by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2991
  • More accurate registration and usage data in nodeinfo by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2992
  • Update erb_lint config to new naming by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3003
  • Temporarily remove model and collection follow buttons by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3005
  • Update translation strings (DE, PL, FR, ES) by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3006

Full Changelog: https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/compare/v0.84.1...v0.85.0

entry.title: New release for Manyfold: v0.85.1

ğŸ› ï¸ Other Improvements ğŸ› ï¸

entry.title: New release for Manyfold: v0.86.0
entry.content:
This release adds another long-requested feature, a big download button for an entire model! No, I'm not sure how it took this long either. But, there's not just one download button - there are options! You can download just the supported files, just the unsupported, or just one particular file type!

Note: The downloads are generated on the fly (and cached for 6 hours), so for large models it might take a little while to start downloading; we'll get some UI feedback for that into a future release so you can see what's happening.

What's Changed

âœ¨ New Features âœ¨

  • Add Download button for entire model, with file subset options by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3020
  • Add opengraph metadata to creator pages by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3014

ğŸ› Bug Fixes ğŸ›

  • Restore missing model page title by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3025
  • Fix model supported/unsupported test by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3026
  • Change to sidekiq-cron for more reliable job scheduling by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3033

ğŸ› ï¸ Other Improvements ğŸ› ï¸

  • Remove built-in log viewer; use Docker logs instead by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3013
  • Translation updates (DE, ES, PL) by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3023
  • Improvements to download UX and cache sweeping by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3034
  • Hide cache clearance jobs from activity list by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3035
  • Add proper markup to download links by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3041

Full Changelog: https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/compare/v0.85.1...v0.86.0
